content:
# Factorio Factory Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at Position(16.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(16.0, 0.0)
- Wooden chest at position(17.5, -0.5) for coal storage with 47 coal
- Burner inserter at position(18.5, -0.5) that takes items from outside and puts them into the chest
- Burner inserter at position(17.5, 0.5) that takes coal from the chest but has no output destination

### Coal Mining Operation at Position(16.0, 3.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(16.0, 3.0)
- Wooden chest at position(17.5, 2.5) for coal storage with 164 coal

### Power Generation System
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, -0.5) producing water
- PipeGroup with water at position(-8.5, -0.5) connected to the offshore pump
- Boiler at position(-5.0, -0.5) with LEFT orientation and 20 coal as fuel
- Steam engine at position(-5.5, -3.5) with RIGHT orientation
- Connecting pipes between the boiler and steam engine
- Burner inserter at position(-4.5, 1.5) for feeding coal to the boiler
- Second offshore pump at position(-9.5, 1.5) (not connected to the system)
- Empty PipeGroup at position(-6.5, 5.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting at Position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(16.0, 71.0) mining iron ore (currently out of fuel)
- Stone furnace at position(16.0, 74.0) with 20 coal as fuel
- Wooden chest at position(16.5, 72.5) for iron ore storage with 114 iron ore
- Wooden chest at position(16.5, 76.5) for iron plate storage

### Copper Mining and Smelting at Position(-46.0, 71.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(-46.0, 71.0) mining copper ore with 1 coal as fuel
- Stone furnace at position(-46.0, 74.0) with 20 coal as fuel
- Wooden chest at position(-45.5, 72.5) for copper ore storage with 104 copper ore
- Burner inserter at position(-45.5, 75.5) that moves processed copper from furnace
- Wooden chest at position(-45.5, 76.5) for copper plate storage

### Iron Gear Wheel Assembly at Position(30.5, 30.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(30.5, 30.5) set to craft iron gear wheels
- Burner inserter at position(28.5, 30.5) for feeding iron plates to the assembler

### Iron Plate Storage at Position(30.5, 20.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position(30.5, 20.5) for iron plate storage

### New Iron Smelting Setup at Position(50.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(50.0, 0.0) with 16 coal as fuel, currently smelting 5 iron ore with 23 iron plates produced
- Burner inserter at position(48.5, 0.5) with RIGHT orientation for feeding iron ore to the furnace
- Burner inserter at position(52.5, 0.5) with RIGHT orientation for removing iron plates from the furnace

### New Copper Smelting Setup at Position(50.0, 5.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(50.0, 5.0) with 16 coal as fuel, currently smelting 5 copper ore with 24 copper plates produced

### New Iron Smelting Setup at Position(30.0, 50.
